article_title: 'Children are dying as we speak' - World Food Programme.
sentence: Food  charity  World  Central  Kitchen  paused  its  operations  in  Gaza  earlier  this  week  after  seven  of  its  aid  workers  were  killed  in  an  Israeli  air  strike.

article_title: 'Children are dying as we speak' - World Food Programme.
sentence: "It  was  unconscionable  that  WCK  was  hit,  it's  a  terrible  situation;  there's  been  more  aid  workers  than  those  who  have  been  killed  and  we're  sorry  for  all  of  them.  "
